comment.author: 21647809@N04
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/29454428@N08]

Great shot of trolley bus No 3 .. trolley buses didn't last long in Sydney ... interestingly they were classified as the Q-class on the tramway classification system (between the P-class cross bench tram and the R-class corridor cars) but carried their own road numbers.
